text: Joseph "Joe" Walsh (1 May 1943 – 9 November 2014) was an Irish Fianna Fáil politician. He was a Teachta Dála for Cork South–West. He was first elected at the 1977 general election. He lost his seat in 1981 but regained it again in 1982 and served until he retired at the 2007 general election. He served as Minister for Agriculture and Food on two occasions (1992–1994 and 1997–2004). Walsh died on 9 November 2014 in Wilton, Cork, Ireland, aged 71. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians from County Cork
title: Joe Walsh (Irish politician)
